If this garbage bags are bought in lesser quantities like 1 pack (30 bags) or 2 packs then it is best for buyer or consumer. If you buy a 6 monthly pack or annual pack them about 30 percent of the bags are defective. Defective in the sense that some of them are fused together, some of them are very thin so tear up while some of them start leaking within a few hours of use.
So, even if Shalimar is the best brand of cost effective garbage bags out there, they tend to sneak in bad quality bags in bulk purchases.
